A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie doesn’t do much for the Star Wars fan. The Last Jedi is a reminder that as more content is created the more chances we have for a bad movie. And The Last Jedi is just that\, a poorly told story in the Star Wars universe. I truly believe that one day I’ll appreciate this film in some capacity like I do Lucas’s prequel films. But\, til then Im going to chalk this up as a loss and hope the next one is a little better.
